attributes.action: SAVE ENGLISH FOOTBALL-KEEP EPL GAMES IN THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yesterdays announcment that English premier league games will be staged abroad has come as a welcome one for all fat cat bosses of premier league clubs but this is going to kill the english game today bournemouth football club will e docked ten points for going into administration football should change for the good of the fans not to line pockets  i ask all FOOTBALL FANS irrespective of club to sign this petition and keep our english game english.
I have listed this as life in the community as this is what football is

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
